description:
Fun trail shoes with a little ‘90s style. From their retro midsole, to their pops of colour, the Flume aren’t just another black trail shoe. Designed with a grippy rubber tread and heavily lugged sole that hold onto your pedal’s pins for excellent power transfer on the ups and the downs. Rugged construction can handle dropping into the gnarliest rock gardens, and even the odd pedal bite (better the shoe than you).

  • Tough Cordura® uppers dry quickly and let your feet breathe
  • Added TPU protection at the heel and toe
  • Elastic lace pouch keeps your laces out of your drivetrain
  • D3O® zone tech insoles add extra protection under the heel and ball of the foot
  • Antibacterial mesh helps keep the funk to a minimum
  • Fully gusseted tongue keeps debris out
  • Low-volume design with tailored padding around the toe and collar
  • Flex designed into the heel cup for improved support through the whole pedal stroke
  • Grippy rubber soles offer a secure connection with pedal pins
  • Deeply lugged sole with reverse lugs at the heel and toe for comfortable walking and traction while hike-a-biking
name: Ride Concepts Flume Cycling Shoes - Women's
